column9:
Hand +1, Life +7
When a creature comes into play under your control, it gains two of the following abilities at random: flying, first strike, trample, haste, protection from black, protection from red, or vigilance.

Hand +1, Life -3
{X}, Return a creature you control with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand: Draw a number of cards chosen at random between 0 and X. X can't be 0.

Hand +0, Life +3
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on target permanent you control.

Hand -1, Life +6
{2}: Avatar - Ashling the Pilgrim deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

Hand +0, Life -3
Lands you control have “{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.”

Hand +0, Life -2
{X}, Sacrifice an artifact of converted mana cost
{X}: Deal X damage to target creature or player.

Hand +0, Life +3
{2}: Each player may put a land from his or her hand into play tapped.
{3}: Each player may put a noncreature artifact from his or her hand into play.
{5}: Each player may put a creature card from his/her hand into play. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.

Hand -1, Life +1
You have no maximum hand size.
{0}: Draw three cards. You skip your next turn. Play this ability only once each turn.

Hand +1, Life +0
You may play any colored card from your hand as a copy of a basic land card chosen at random that can produce mana of one of the card's colors.

Hand +0, Life +5
{S}: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Hand +2, Life -3
{1}: Target permanent you control gains protection from a random color it doesn't already have protection from until end of turn.

Hand +0, Life -5
You start the game with a 1/1 green Elf token that has “{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.”

Hand +0, Life +3
Whenever you play a creature spell, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play.

Hand +1, Life -4
You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay the mana cost for spells that you play.

Hand +0, Life -5
Whenever a creature you control goes to a graveyard from play, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Hand +0, Life -6
When a non-token creature comes into play under your control, it deals a random amount of damage between 0 and 4 to target creature.

Hand -1, Life -3
Permenants you control have Phasing. At the end of your turn flip a coin. If you win the flip take an extra turn after this one.

Hand +1, Life +2
Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

Hand -1, Life -2
Whenever a nontoken creature you control goes to a graveyard from play, target opponent discards a card.

Hand +0, Life -3
Pay 1 life: You may play target creature card in your graveyard this turn.
Whenever a creature comes into play, if you played it from your graveyard, it becomes a black Zombie Knight.
Whenever a Zombie Knight would be put into your graveyard from play, remove it from the game instead.

Hand -1, Life +4
The first creature spell you play each turn costs {1} less to play. The first noncreature spell each opponent plays each turn costs 1 more to play.

Hand -1, Life -4
{3}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature from your graveyard to play.

Hand -1, Life +3
Whenever a nontoken creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, take a random creature from your library, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

Hand +0, Life -3
At the beginning of the game, look at target opponent's hand and choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
{X}, Pay X life: Put target creature card with converted mana cost X in an opponent's graveyard into play under your control.

Hand +0, Life +1
{X}: Jaya Ballard deals an amount of damage chosen at random from 0 to X to target creature or player. Play this ability only once each turn.

Hand +1, Life +0
{3}, Discard a card: Copy three instant cards chosen at random. You may play one of the copies without paying its mana cost.
{3}, Discard a card: Copy three sorcery cards chosen at random. You may play one of the copies without paying its mana cost. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery

Hand -1, Life +8
At the beginning of your upkeep, exchange control of a random permanent you control and a random permanent target opponent controls.

Hand +0, Life +12
Sacrifice a permanent: Regenerate target creature you control.

Hand -1, Life -1
#Hellbent# — As long as you have no cards in hand, if a source you control would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals double that damage to that creature or player instead.
#Hellbent# — At the end of your turn, if you have no cards in hand, each of your opponents discards a card.

Hand -2, Life +7
You can't draw cards.
At the beginning of your draw step, search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost. You can't search for a card with the same name as a card you've searched for with Maralen this game.

Hand +2, Life -7
Tap an untapped creature you control, Discard a card: Target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

Hand -2, Life -3
Creatures you control have “{T}: Another target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.”

Hand +1, Life -2
{X}: Choose a creature type. Creatures of that type you control become X/X and gain all creature types until end of turn.

Hand +0, Life +4
{X}, Discard a card: Put a token into play as a copy of a random creature card with converted mana cost X. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery and only once each turn.

Hand +0, Life +30
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life for each permanent you control.

Hand +0, Life -2
Whenever a creature comes into play under your control with a counter on it, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

Hand +0, Life -4
Creature spells you play cost {B} less to play. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.

Hand +0, Life -2
Creatures you control have haste. At the beginning of your upkeep, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

Hand +0, Life +9
{3}: For each opponent who controls a creature, put a token into play as a copy of a card named Arrest and attach it to a creature that player controls chosen at random.

Hand +0, Life -5
Pay 1 life: Until end of turn, whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, destroy that creature.
Pay 1 life: Until end of turn, whenever target creature deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature.

Hand -1, Life -2
If you control an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a land, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

Hand +0, Life +5
At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.

Hand +1, Life +9
Creatures you control get +0/+1. Equipped creatures you control get +1/+0 and have first strike.

Hand -1, Life -5
Each creature you control gets +1/+1 for each of its colors.

Hand -2, Life +0
At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

Hand +1, Life +1
At the beginning of your upkeep, Rumbling Slum deals 1 to each opponent.

Hand +0, Life +1
{2}: Choose a creature you control. It becomes a copy of target creature except for its name.

Hand +0, Life -1
Whenever you play a spell, you gain 2 life.

Hand +0, Life -1
At the beginning of the game, choose a creature type. Creatures you control, creature spells you control on the stack, and creature cards you own that aren't in play or on the stack have the chosen type in addition to their other types.

Hand +1, Life -5
Each creature you control must be blocked if able.
{4}: Remove from the game target creature blocking a creature you control.

Hand +3, Life -4
{1}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature you control this turn.

Hand +0, Life +2
Whenever you play a creature spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

Hand +0, Life -4
Whenever a creature comes into play under your control, put a copy of random Equipment card with converted mana cost less than or equal to that creature's converted mana cost into play. Attach that Equipment to that creature.

Hand +0, Life -6
{0}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you by a source of your choice this turn. Stuffy Doll deals damage equal to half the damage prevented this way, rounded up, to you and target opponent. Play this ability only once per turn.

Hand +0, Life -2
Whenever a non-token creature is put into a graveyard from play, put a 1/1 white, Spirit creature token with flying into play.

Hand +1, Life -4
Each creature you control may block 2 creatures each combat. Each creature you control can't be blocked except by 2 or more creatures.

Hand +0, Life +2
{2}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Search your library for a card with the same name as the creature you sacrificed, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
